objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#121212'/><path d='M0 0L1080 0L1080 1080L0 1080L0 0Z' fill='url(#paint0_linear)'/><path d='M540 0C540 0 1080 0 1080 0V1080H0V0H540Z' fill='url(#paint1_radial)' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0 500L1080 500L1080 1080L0 1080L0 500Z' fill='url(#paint2_linear)' opacity='0.7'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M100 200L140 240L180 200' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M880 300L920 340L960 300' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M200 800L240 840L280 800' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M780 700L820 740L860 700' stroke='#FF5722' stroke-width='2'/></g><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='50' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='880' cy='300' r='40' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='240' cy='800' r='60' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='820' cy='700' r='45' fill='#FF5722' opacity='0.1'/><defs><linearGradient id='paint0_linear' x1='540' y1='0' x2='540' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#1A1A1A'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#0A0A0A'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='paint1_radial' cx='0' cy='0' r='1' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse' gradientTransform='translate(540 540) rotate(90) scale(540)'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#FF5722' stop-opacity='0.2'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#121212' stop-opacity='0'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='paint2_linear' x1='540' y1='500' x2='540' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#121212' stop-opacity='0'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

product_details.description: NA 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Display 64MP Rear Camera | 13MP Front Camera 5500 mAh Battery Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Processor

banner_details:
The banner showcases a futuristic, high-tech vibe suited for a 5G gaming smartphone advertisement. Positioned centrally, the "product_image" draws attention, featuring a sleek, modern phone at an angle for dynamic appeal. At the top, the bold "heading" establishes the product name in a solid white tech-style font, while the "subheading" directly below it reinforces its gaming identity with a vibrant orange color for emphasis. A stylized price is shown with the "price" text at the bottom, clearly visible in white. Just beneath this, the vivid orange rectangle "cta_background" houses the distinct white "cta" text to drive action. The background is enriched with dark gradients, faint circular elements, and a touch of orange line graphics to add depth and energy.

**Color Palette**:
- Black: #000000
- Dark Gray: #121212
- White: #FFFFFF
- Orange Accent: #FF5722
product_color: The product image features a bold, futuristic color palette that blends matte charcoal black (#1A1A1A) for the phone body with vibrant orange (#FF4C00) accents, symbolizing innovation and high-tech energy. The glowing neon orange of the glasses and the POVA "5G" logo creates striking contrast against the deep black background (#000000), drawing attention to key elements. Cool teal-green tones (#00C2B8) used on the model’s face add balance and highlight depth. The design smartly merges warm and cool hues to express performance and style, ideal for a tech-savvy campaign. Key colors for the advertisement banner: #1A1A1A, #FF4C00, #00C2B8, #FFFFFF.
